channel.title: Admin
channel.description: how i make admins not able to trade or drop?

item.title: Admin
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Jasper, you don’t need [size=10pt]multiple topics[/size] I already answered your question on this same subject. (usually) in client class under your trading packet add this if (playerRights == 2) return; if you’re using PI/Emulous look in the config class and you should see something like

public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; change true; to false; then admins will no longer be able to trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin
item.dc:creator: @RspsMania RspsMania
item.description:
@RspsMania wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:2, topic:360636”]i suggest not making any admins. rather make mods , much better.

and make your ::pickup or ::item , whatever it is that your using, only for owners.

easiest way.[/quote]No… Admins cant ever transfer any of their items to anyone or anything… can lose by death… cant trade… cant drop… only hidden admins can… and my suggestion is not to make any admins tradable mainly because some people dont quite get the concept of DONT OVER SPAWN… Thanks…

Read full topic

item.title: Admin
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

i suggest not making any admins. rather make mods , much better.

and make your ::pickup or ::item , whatever it is that your using, only for owners.

easiest way.
